snippet: Connecticut Coach Jim Calhoun’s left hip fracture could be a factor at the start of the season but will probably not keep him from a return to coaching, an orthopedic surgeon said.
abstract: Connecticut men's basketball coach Jim Calhoun is expected to return to coaching after recovering from fracturing his hip in a fall.
lead_paragraph: Connecticut Coach Jim Calhoun’s left hip fracture could be a factor at the start of the season but will probably not keep him from a return to coaching, an orthopedic surgeon said.

headline.main: Surgeon Says Calhoun Should Be Able to Coach
headline.print_headline: Surgeon Says Calhoun Should Be Able to Coach
